Restricted            
 
                NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/Div.I(Vehicle) 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
          Date: 18/02/2010 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 07/ 2010 
 
Sub:       PERMISSION FOR  ACCESS TO  THE  VEHICLE UP TO TARMAC 
ON MEDICAL GROUND IN RESPECT OF DR. KARAN SINGH, 
PRESIDENT, INDIAN COUNCIL FOR CULTURAL RELATIONS. 
 
Reference BCAS Circular No. 36/2005 dated 30/8/2005 on the 
subject cited above. 
  
                Dr. Karan Singh, President, Indian Council for Cultural Relations, is 
hereby permitted to take his own vehicle up to the tarmac, during arrival/ 
departure at all airports in the country, on medical grounds, for a period of one 
year w.e.f 18.02.2010. 
 
               This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution: As per list attached. 
 
Copy to: 
 
1. MCA ( Shri S Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary ) :  w.r.t MCA letter No. 
AV.13024/37/2003-SS dated 12/02/2010 & 18/2/2010 
2. Shri Mohan Singh Sen, Sr. Private Secretary to Dr. Karan Singh, President,  
Indian Council for cultural Relations  127, Parliament House Annexe, New 
Delhi
